author: rse
msg: Replace the inlined information grabbing stuff for the configuration
adjustment feature (no --without-confadjust) with calls to a new helper script
`buildinfo.sh' which is both more flexible and already proofed to be more
robust against platform differences (latest ePerl and WML releases shipped
with it and no problems with it were discovered by the users). This mainly
fixes the recently occured ``sed: command garbled: ...'' problems.

author: rse
msg: without complains after we recently added the POST feature.

author: rse
msg: Renamed is_HTTP_xxx() macros to ap_is_HTTP_xxx() name. They are used inside
modules as API functions and we forgot them at the big symbol renaming.

author: marc
msg: Cool deals on end-of-line Thinkpad 560Es at microwarehouse.

author: rse
msg: Remove bad reference to non-existing SERVER_VERSION in mod_rewrite.html
